description:
Sard Oils & Grime, Laundry Stain Remover Spray, Expert Action on Oily Foods, Collar Grime & Make-Up, Made in Australia, 420ml

Sard Oils & Grime is your stain remover expert with anti-grease technology specially formulated to target oily and fatty stains:
- Oily Foods
- Cuff & Collar Grime
- Make-Up
- Butter & Sauces

Safe to use on whites and colourfast colours.
We are proudly made in Australia.The Sard bottle and  trigger are recyclable.
Sard, Australia's stain expert is tough on stains, gentle on clothes. 

Sard Oils & Grime specially formulated against oily & fatty stains

Effective on oily foods; cuff & collar grime; makeup; butter & sauces

Safe to use on whites and colourfast colours

Bottle and trigger are recyclable
name: Sard Oils & Grime Stain Remover Spray 420ml
